column4: Anyone has an idea? I've installed ubuntu but when i login theres nothing, only a background with my mouse cursor.. no icons, nothing
I mean, are you using Gnome? KDE? Openbox?
and what happens when you log on?
Now i see xinit: unable to connect to X server
Well.. you see the brown background
X is having trouble connecting to the server. Is xorg-xserver installed? (I think thats the package name)
lemme try sudo apt-get install xorg-xserver
change the ownership on .Xauthority in your home directory to your user
